body.name: Handheld Game Console, 800 Classic FC Retro Game with 3.5" LCD Screen, Portable Video Games, 1200mAh Rechargeable Battery, Support to Connect TV & 2 Players
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 18 - 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 🎮【800 Retro Classic Games】The game console includes 800 popular FC games : Arcade retro games, soccer, sports, puzzle, shooting, action, racing, fighting games, adventure and more. Take your memories back to the fun of your childhood and enjoy family fun time.back to your childhood and find your happy memories.

🎮【Support 2 Players Playing Games on TV】The package also includes a gamepad that can be connected to a small handheld game console for two-player games. the 3.5-inch LCD screen can be connected to a TV via the AV output so you can easily enjoy vivid and exciting video games on the TV's big screen.

🎮【Rechargeable Battery】Built-in 1200mAh high-capacity rechargeable battery, the game console can be played for 6 hours after a full charge. Built-in 800mAh high-capacity battery can be charged. After each full charge, the game can be played for 5 hours after a full charge. You don't have to worry about running out of power when on a travel or camping.

🎮【Amazing Gifts to Kids/Adults】The handheld video game console is an ideal gift for children, boys, girls, family and friends on birthdays, Christmas, etc. The interactive entertainment of the game competition enhances parent-child interaction and brings more laughter and happiness to the whole family.

🎮【Ergonomic Design】: The ergonomic retro game cartridge ensures a comfortable grip and the ultra-sensitive non-slip buttons give you precise control. It allows you to immerse yourself in the classic and exciting world of gaming and enjoy a great experience.
body.description: Tips:The screen is covered with a protective film,you can peel off it. The console does not have the function to save the progress of the game. When you leave the game, the progress is 0.If you want to play on television, please make sure your TV is able to connect with AV OUTPUT cable before purchasing.Specification:Item Type: Handheld Game ConsoleMaterial: PlasticBattery: 1200mahSize: Approx. 5.7 x 2.76 x 0.79inScreen: 3.5 inchesResolution: 1080 x 680Package List:1 x Game Console1 x AV cable1 x Charging cable1 x Manual
